instanceDefinition.name: A10
instanceDefinition.Definition: (TELL (:ABOUT A10 (:CREATE AIRCRAFT) FIGHTER-ATTACK-AIRCRAFT (R-AIRCRAFT-MISSION-TYPES OFFENSIVE-COUNTERAIR) (R-AIRCRAFT-MISSION-TYPES STRATEGIC-ATTACK) (R-AIRCRAFT-MISSION-TYPES INTERDICTION) (R-AIRCRAFT-MISSION-TYPES CLOSE-AIR-SUPPORT) (R-AIRCRAFT-MISSION-TYPES COMBAT-SUPPORT) (R-AIRCRAFT-PRIMARY-MISSION-TYPES CLOSE-AIR-SUPPORT)))
